text: The 2016 Atlantic 10 Men's Basketball Tournament was held March 9 through 13, 2016, at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York. The champion earned an automatic bid to the 2016 NCAA Tournament. ==Seeds== All 14 Atlantic 10 schools participate in the tournament. Teams will be seeded by the 2015–16 Atlantic 10 Conference season record. The top 10 teams received a first round bye and the top four teams received a double bye. Teams were seeded by record within the conference, with a tiebreaker system to seed teams with identical conference records. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference !Tiebreaker |- |1 |align=left|Dayton |14–4 |align=left|2–1 vs. VCU & St. Bonaventure |- |2 |align=left|VCU |14–4 |align=left|1–1 vs. Dayton & St. Bonaventure |- |3 |align=left|St. Bonaventure |14–4 |align=left|1–2 vs. Dayton & VCU |- |4 |align=left|Saint Joseph's |13–5 | |- |5 |align=left|George Washington |11–7 | |- |6 |align=left|Davidson |10–8 | |- |7 |align=left|Rhode Island |9–9 | |- |8 |align=left|Fordham |8–10 | |- |9 |align=left|Richmond |7–11 | |- |10 |align=left|Massachusetts |6–12 |align=left|1–0 vs. Duquesne |- |11 |align=left|Duquesne |6–12 |align=left|0–1 vs. Massachusetts |- |12 |align=left|George Mason |5–13 |align=left|1–1 vs. Saint Louis, 0–1 vs. Dayton |- |13 |align=left|Saint Louis |5–13 |align=left|1–1 vs. George Mason, 0–2 vs. Dayton |- |14 |align=left|La Salle |4–14 | |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;
